channel.title: Comments on: Turtorial is always out of date …

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
WordPress is not user friendly enough - I was composing this post and after post, it tells me I need to login, and after login, obviously I lots my post and had to re-enter.
Too bad.
item.content:encoded:
WordPress is not user friendly enough – I was composing this post and after post, it tells me I need to login, and after login, obviously I lots my post and had to re-enter.

Too bad.
